attributes.additional_details:
Warrington People are supporting one another to reposition the memorial in the town centre area..Its not dangerous to access due to road development..No parking no seating ..not looked after regular...its a shame and a disgrace for our fallen troops...there are names that need to be put on there i know of 2 on a personal family level...
I started the facebook support page julie francis along with Jeff Butler..we have local papers involved and will be pushing at the local council..There spending 52 million on the town centre id say just a few to deal with this issue alot feel strong about...
We have other sites in mind and need as much help and support thru all that have pulling power..i will fight till this is sorted..
We Wont Give Up..
Warrington Cenotaph Reposition

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local council.
